abstracts.cdata!:
Within the sectors selected, the items
            eligible for financing under this Reconstruction Imports
            Project fall into two major categories: (i) equipment and
            spare parts to replace or repair capital goods destroyed or
            damaged during 1971, to restore the economy's pre-war
            productive capacity; and (ii) materials, components or
            intermediate goods needed as inputs to utilize existing
            productive capacity fully and to regain the nation's
            pre-war levels of agricultural and industrial production.
            With a few minor exceptions, the project will not create new
            capacity. The exceptions (shallow tubewells and low lift
            pumps) are included because they afford the most efficient
            and rapid path to restoring previous trends in foodgrain
            output, and to lowering food import requirements. The
            project, then, will be a reconstruction credit in the
            literal sense of the term.
